getItem.description: get an item from the inventory

discardItem.description: Permanently discard from inventory. If the specified quantity is greater or equal to the max of that item, all are removed

removeItemForUse.description: Removes item from inventory to be used. This use can be consumption or throwing, depending on the specific item.

addItem.description: Adds an item to the inventory if there is enough space or capacity, returns the result of attempting to add the item.
